# datapower_gatewaypeering (Resource)

Gateway peering
  - CLI Alias: `gateway-peering`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "datapower_gatewaypeering" "test" {
  id         = "___GatewayPeering_name"
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
  local_port = 16380
}
```
